description: Aspose.Cells for .NET is a spreadsheet programming component that allows software developers to manipulate and convert spreadsheet files from within their own applications. A combination of APIs and GUI controls, Aspose.Cells for .NET speeds up Microsoft Excel programming and conversion.
releaseNotes:
New Features
(CELLSNET-44376)- Provide the ability to prohibit the conversion of long numeric values to exponential notation while importing from HTML 
(CELLSNET-44360)- Detecting leading single quote mark in cell 
(CELLSNET-44356)- Get target or output cell address for an ExternalConnection 
(CELLSNET-44350)- Add session timeout alert for gridweb 
(CELLSNET-44340)- Support for localization of client side validation [German] 
Enhancements
(CELLSNET-44345)- Formula for WordArt does not react to argument change while converting XLS to XLSB 
Performance
(CELLSNET-44342)- Process seems to hang with 100% CPU usage for converting single page spreadsheet to PDF 
Bugs
(CELLSNET-44324)- XLSM becomes corrupted after re-populating the data and refreshing the Pivot Table 
(CELLSNET-44312)- Line breaks are lost while importing HTML and exporting to spreadsheet 
(CELLSNET-44311)- Borders are lost while importing HTML and exporting to spreadsheet 
(CELLSNET-44286)- Sample1.xlsx is getting corrupted after getting opened and refreshed 
(CELLSNET-44375)-Incorrect encoding with the target (CSV) file
(CELLSNET-44368)- Millions number formatting issue while converting excel to pdf 
(CELLSNET-44347)- API renders two PDF pages for one worksheet regardless of setting OnePagePerSheet to true 
(CELLSNET-44335)- Text is getting trimmed while rendering spreadsheet 
(CELLSNET-44382)- Chart is not generated correctly in output excel file 
(CELLSNET-44373)- Alignment issue with bulleted list (shape) in the rendered image 
(CELLSNET-44337)- Style of the bulleted list (shape) is different in the output image 
(CELLSNET-44300)- Part of X-axis labels is getting rendered in horizontal orientation while converting chart to image 
(CELLSNET-44372)- Excel file with embedded documents gets corrupt on saving 
(CELLSNET-44369)- #Ref! after copying cells containing references to named cells from one book to another 
(CELLSNET-44359)- Removing the password from a protected spreadsheet changes the embedded object name 
(CELLSNET-44348)- Number gets rounded off when converting HTML to spreadsheet format 
(CELLSNET-44326)- Clicking on a cell changes the formatted text to its HTML source 
(CELLSNET-44325)- Gridweb changes content of data validation List/dropdown 
(CELLSNET-44321)- Context menu grows up when rows or columns are added through it 
(CELLSNET-44320)- Adding rows and columns through context menu is not working 
Exceptions
(CELLSNET-44323)- Object reference not set to an instance of an object at PivotTable.RefreshData 
(CELLSNET-44355)- Index was outside the bounds of the array exception while converting excel to pdf 
(CELLSNET-44354)- Shape to image Error on converting excel to pdf 
(CELLSNET-44380)-"Invalid formula" when loading a specific Excel file via Aspose.Cells APIs 
(CELLSNET-44370)-"Invalid sectionId of Header Footer image" on opening the Excel file 
(CELLSNET-44357)- System.ArgumentException: Item has already been added, at Workbook ctor 
(CELLSNET-44330)- Object reference not set exception on opening excel file 
(CELLSNET-44339)- 500 Internal Error: "Error in Cell: Invalid Formula" by inserting invalid formula in GridWeb UI
summary: Aspose.Cells for .Net is a class library for Excel document processing
title: Aspose.Cells for .NET
